name: Duergar Hammerer
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.Engine of Pain: Once per turn, a creature that attacks the hammerer can target the duergar trapped in it. The attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll. On a hit, the attack deals an extra 5 (1d10) damage to the hammerer, and the hammerer can respond by using its Multiattack with its reaction.
traits.Siege Monster: The hammerer deals double damage to objects and structures.
